thread.title: KZN kids rushed to hospital after near drowning
thread.title_full: KZN kids rushed to hospital after near drowning | News24

author: news24.com
title: KZN kids rushed to hospital after near drowning
text:
Durban - Paramedics in KwaZulu-Natal are on high alert after the near drowning of two children at a public swimming pool in Gamalahke, near Port Shepstone on Thursday.
This is the latest in a string of drowning-related incidents as a heat wave sweeps across South Africa.
KZN EMS spokesperson Robert McKenzie said medics were alerted to the incident at the pool but arrived to find that the children had already been rushed to hospital in a private vehicle where their condition was not known.
He said the incident raised an important point.
